question: In 1943, Franklin D. Roosevelt, Winston Churchill and Joseph Stalin met at Teheran primarily
option1: to discuss the strategy to be adopted by the Allies to invade Germany
option2: to consider a common plan of action by the Allies forces against the axis powers
option3: for creating an effective instrument for maintaining international peace
option4: to work out a common line of action against Japan
answer: for creating an effective instrument for maintaining international peace
